layout_description: The template features a prominent 'PURCHASE ORDER' title across the top (A1:L2). Key order details such as Date, Invoice, and Voyage are positioned on the right side (J4:L6). Supplier contact information is listed on the left (A7:A18). Delivery and payment terms, along with a summary total, occupy the middle-right section (F8:L18). The core of the template is a product table (A20:L32) with a two-row header (20-21) and 11 data rows (22-32). Within the product table, the 'Description' column (F:G) is merged for each data row. The table is followed by a totals section (I33:L35) for Sub Total, Tax, and Grand Total, with currency in column J and calculated values in column L. A footer message 'THANK YOU FOR YOUR BUSINESS!' spans the bottom (A37:L37).

sections.name: Order Details
sections.description: Key information about the purchase order, invoice, and voyage.

sections.name: Supplier Information
sections.description: Contact details for the supplier (Merit Trading Co., Ltd.).

sections.name: Delivery & Payment Information
sections.description: Details regarding delivery date, address, payment terms, and contact person, including a displayed total.

sections.name: Product Table
sections.description: Table listing all products being ordered with their details, quantities, and prices.

sections.name: Summary Totals
sections.description: Calculated subtotal, tax, and grand total for the order.

variables.label: DATE：
variables.description: The date the purchase order is issued. (Merged K4:L4)

variables.label: Voyage：
variables.description: The voyage number for the shipment. (Merged K6:L6)

variables.label: Delivery Address:
variables.sample_value: 神奈川県横浜市中区海岸通り1-1-4
variables.description: First line of the delivery address. (Merged H9:L9)
Second line of the delivery address, often company name.
Contact person and phone number for delivery.
Name of the ship for delivery.

variables.label: 担当者及び連絡先：
variables.description: Contact person and phone number for the purchase order. (Merged H15:J15)

variables.label: TOTAL:
variables.description: The grand total amount displayed in the summary section. This is a calculated field.

columns.description: Sequential row number for each product item.
Product name in the local language (Japanese).
Detailed description or specifications of the product.
Unit of measure for the quantity (e.g., CT for carton, EA for each).
Currency for the unit price (e.g., JPY).
Price per unit of the product.
Calculated total amount for the line item (Quantity * Unit Price).
